$ROKU It's the platform segment that provides the bulk of Roku's revenue and profits. The company takes a percentage of all sales conducted on its platform. Sign up for Netflix on Roku -- it takes a piece. Sign up for Disney+ on Roku -- it takes another piece. Those two services, of course, are ad-free. With streaming services that are supported by commercials, Roku receives a share of the revenue generated by showing advertisements to viewers on its platform. In some ways, Roku is similar to $AAPL Apple's App Store in terms of how it earns money from activity in its ecosystem.
